 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַח‎</span> **verb** ==bud, sprout, shoot== (NT Hiph\`il = Biblical Hebrew **Hiph\`il 2**; Ecclus <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרח‎</span> **Qal** = ***flourish***, **Hiph\`il** causative, [[Eccl.49.10|Eccl 49:10]]; [[Eccl.40.19|Eccl 40:19]] Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II. ***hatch***, also ***sprout***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***young*** of bird (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפְרֹחַ‎</span> below), ***twig, sprout***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pir—u***</u></abbr>, noun ***sprout***; — on meaning compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]<sup>JBL x (1891), 57</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Ezek.7.10|Ezek 7:10]] +, etc; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרַח‎</span> [[Hos.14.6|Hos 14:6]] +, 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְרַחְנָה‎</span> [[Isa.66.14|Isa 66:14]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרֹחַ‎</span> [[Isa.35.2|Isa 35:2]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּפְרֹךְ‎</span> [[Ps.92.8|Ps 92:8]] ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרַ֫חַת‎</span> [[Gen.40.10|Gen 40:10]] — ***bud, sprout, send out shoots***, of vine [[Gen.40.10|Gen 40:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Hos.14.8|Hos 14:8]] (simile), [[Song.6.11|Song 6:11]]; [[Song.7.13|Song 7:13]] fig-tree [[Hab.3.17|Hab 3:17]] (&lt; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְרֶח‎</span>); rods [[Num.17.20|Num 17:20]]; [[Num.17.23|Num 17:23]] metaphor of restored Israel [[Hos.14.6|Hos 14:6]]; [[Isa.27.6|Isa 27:6]], compare of bones [[Isa.66.14|Isa 66:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּדֶּשֶׁא‎</span>); of righteous [[Ps.72.7|Ps 72:7]]; [[Ps.92.13|Ps 92:13]]; [[Prov.11.28|Prov 11:28]] of wicked (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּמוֺ עֵשֶׂב‎</span>) [[Ps.92.8|Ps 92:8]] also of steppe (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָבָה‎</span>) [[Isa.35.1|Isa 35:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרֹחַ תִּפְרַח‎</span> v[[Isa.35.2|Isa 35:2]] figurative of judgment [[Hos.10.4|Hos 10:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּראֹשׁ‎</span>; but on text see [[BDB#Now|Now]]); of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָדוֺן‎</span> (q. v. p. 268) [[Ezek.7.10|Ezek 7:10]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפְרַחְתִּי‎</span> [[Ezek.17.24|Ezek 17:24]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְרִחַ‎</span> [[Job.14.9|Job 14:9]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***cause to bud*** or ***sprout***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵץ‎</span> [[Ezek.17.24|Ezek 17:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֶרַע‎</span> [[Isa.17.11|Isa 17:11]], both figurative 

**2.** ***shew buds, sprouts***, of tree [[Job.14.9|Job 14:9]] figurative of righteous [[Ps.92.14|Ps 92:14]] = flourish, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹהֶל יְשָׁרִים‎</span>, [[Prov.14.11|Prov 14:11]] (all **Qal** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ִ֯‎</span> according to [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xliii (1889), 180 f.</sup>). 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַח‎</span> **verb** ==break out==, of leprosy and like eruptions (in [[BDB#P|P]]) (usually taken as = I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span>, but dubious; Late Hebrew ***id.***, also ***decay, ferment*** [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>Landwirthschaft 22</sup>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***spread***, of leprosy, etc.; NS. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***leprous spots***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Lev.13.39|Lev 13:39]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּהַקִ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפ‎</span> consecutive [[Lev.14.43|Lev 14:43]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶגַע‎</span>); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַעַת‎</span> 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָ֑חָה‎</span> [[Lev.13.20|Lev 13:20]]; [[Lev.13.25|Lev 13:25]], also ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular + ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרוֺחַ תִּפְרַח‎</span> v[[Lev.13.12|Lev 13:12]], and ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרַחַת‎</span> see 42; of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁחִין‎</span> ***Participle*** masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרֵחַ‎</span> [[Exod.9.9|Exod 9:9]]; [[Exod.9.10|Exod 9:10]]. 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַח‎</span>] **verb** ==fly==, Aramaism, si vera lectio (Late Hebrew ***id.***, especially ***fly away***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּרַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fly***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***insect, bird***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפֹרְחוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.13.20|Ezek 13:20]] (twice in verse) ***for*** (like ?) ***flying things***, i. e. birds, but strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] in v<sup>a</sup> (where probably insert from v<sup>b</sup>); [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] in v<sup>a</sup>; v<sup>b</sup>.
